lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Swissair yesterday confirmed an order for the MD-11 long haul jets worth 1.2 billion Swiss francs and said it had preferred the McDonnell Douglas planes over the A340, a project that has not yet been formally launched, as it met the airline's requirements better and would be able to enter service in 1990.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In January, SAS officials said Airbus had made a revised offer that included larger, more powerful engines and two versions of the four-engine plane.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The SAS move, said by analysts to be a big blow to McDonnell Douglas, came following a Copenhagen board meeting of the airline in which the governments of Sweden, Denmark and Norway jointly own a 50 pct stake.
